definitions.definition: to consider or have an opinion about something or someone:
examples: Environmentalists regard GM technology with suspicion.

definitions.definition: to look carefully at something or someone:
examples: The bird regarded me with suspicion as I walked up to its nest.
There is no problem as regards the financial arrangements.

definitions.definition: respect or admiration for someone or something:
examples: The company holds her in high regard.
I am writing to you with regard to your letter of 15 March.
The union is the largest in the country and in this/that regard is best placed to serve its members.
Please give/send/convey my regards to your mother if you see her.
